alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Irwin (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 13 at 5:25PM EDT until June 13 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR IRWIN AND BEN HILL COUNTIES... At 525 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Rochelle to near Enigma, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fitzgerald, Ocilla, Mystic, Lulaville, Osierfield, Waterloo, Pinetta, Ashton, Irwinville, Fitzgerald Municipal A/P, Irwinville Airport, Wray, Bowens Mill, Red Bluff, Arp, Abba and Queensland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
